abstract: New York City agrees to pay $5.75 million to settle lawsuit related to 2013 death of Bradley Ballard, mentally ill inmate who was locked in cell at Rikers Island for six days and later found naked and covered in urine; settlement appears to be largest city has ever paid to settle suit over death of inmate in city custody.

headline.print_headline: City to Pay $5.75 Million Over Death of a Mentally Ill Inmate
headline.main: City to Pay $5.75 Million Over Death of Mentally Ill Inmate at Rikers Island

snippet: Bradley Ballard was found naked and covered in feces and urine after being locked in a cell at the New York City jail complex for six days....
lead_paragraph: Bradley Ballard was found naked and covered in feces and urine after being locked in a cell at the New York City jail complex for six days.
